The Oblitercons/Punch:



Hiss, Scavenger, Breakdown, and Pyro stopped near the shields, defenses going 
down long enough for them to enter the base, not even a millisecond later the 
defenses powering back up to full.

The four Oblitercons entered the CR room, looking around at the seven CR 
chambers.  Each got into one, grumbling about not getting to rip out any 
Maximal sparks from their dirty Maximal bodies.

----

Dark One flipped out of his CR chamber, landing on the ground evenly on both 
mechanical feet.  Stretching, he yelled out.  

Using his internal scanning equipment to pinpoint an energy-signature, Dark 
One walked for a few cycles, seeing a large door to a room.  Letting the door 
slide open as his motion was detected, Dark One walked in.

Seeing Feline all over Zardus, Dark One smiled.  "Oh, you're busy.  Well, 
I'll talk now, not later."

Walking over to Zardus, Dark One pushed at Feline hard, attempting to knock 
her back.

"Requesting orders."
